lesson_html:
• Hello! - A common way to greet someone.
  • How are you? - A friendly way to ask about someone's well-being.
  • Good morning/afternoon/evening! - Time-specific greetings to show politeness.
  • Nice to meet you! - Used when meeting someone for the first time.
  • Goodbye! - A way to say farewell when parting.

items.explanation_en: This is a common question to ask someone.

items.en: Do you have any plans for today?
items.explanation_en: This question inquires about someone's schedule.

items.en: I hope you are doing well.
items.explanation_en: This expresses a wish for someone's good health.
This asks about someone's activities from the previous day.
This question checks on someone's enjoyment during their time off.
This indicates a plan to meet someone the next day.
This question inquires about someone's family well-being.

items.en: It's been a while since we met.
items.target: Ha pasado un tiempo desde que nos vimos.
items.explanation_en: This acknowledges the time since the last meeting.

items.en: I look forward to seeing you again.
items.explanation_en: This expresses anticipation for a future meeting.

items.en: Have you been to this place before?
items.explanation_en: This asks if someone has previous experience at a location.
